edges.name: Alertness
edges.description: +2 to Notice rolls.

edges.name: Ambidextrous
edges.description: Ignore -2 penalty when making Trait rolls with off-hand.

edges.name: Arcane Background (Gifted)
edges.description: The character has innate abilities that don't fit into the usual tropes of magic, miracles, or psionics.

edges.name: Arcane Background (Magic)
edges.description: Magicians draw on raw supernatural energy to fuel their eldritch powers.

edges.name: Arcane Background (Miracles)
edges.description: The character draws power from a divine presence, such as gods, nature, or spirits.

edges.name: Arcane Background (Psionics)
edges.description: Psionicists tap into their own mental energy to manipulate matter and read minds.

edges.name: Arcane Background (Weird Science)
edges.description: Weird scientists use strange and powerful inventions beyond the normal technological level.

edges.name: Arcane Resistance
edges.description: Enemy arcane skills targeting the hero suffer a -2 penalty; magical damage is reduced by 2.

edges.name: Improved Arcane Resistance
edges.description: As Arcane Resistance except penalty is increased to -4 and magical damage is reduced by 4.

edges.name: Aristocrat
edges.description: +2 to Common Knowledge and networking with upper class.

edges.name: Attractive
edges.description: +1 to Performance and Persuasion rolls. (+1 point added to Skill Points for you to add to these skills)

edges.name: Very Attractive
edges.description: +2 to Performance and Persuasion rolls.(+1 point added to Skill Points for you to add to these skills)

edges.name: Berserk
edges.description: After being Shaken or Wounded, melee attacks must be Wild Attacks, +1 die type to Strength, +2 to Toughness, ignore one level of Wound penalties, Critical Failure on Fighting roll hits random target. Take Fatigue after every five consecutive rounds, may choose to end rage with Smarts roll -2.

edges.name: Brave
edges.description: +2 to Fear checks and -2 to rolls on the Fear Table.

edges.name: Brawny
edges.description: Size (and therefore Toughness) +1. Treat Strength as one die type higher for Encumbrance and Minimum Strength to use weapons, armor, or equipment.

edges.name: Brute
edges.description: Link Athletics to Strength instead of Agility (including resistance). Short Range of any thrown item increased by +1. Double that for the adjusted Medium Range, and double again for Long Range.

edges.name: Charismatic
edges.description: Free reroll when using Persuasion.

edges.name: Elan
edges.description: +2 when spending a Benny to reroll a Trait roll.

edges.name: Fame
edges.description: +1 to Persuasion rolls when recognized (Common Knowledge), double usual fee for Performance.

edges.name: Famous
edges.description: +2 to Persuasion when recognized, 5x or more usual fee for Performance.

edges.name: Fast Healer
edges.description: +2 Vigor when rolling for natural healing; check every 3 days.

edges.name: Fleet-Footed
edges.description: Pace +2, increase running die one step.

edges.name: Linguist
edges.description: Character has d6 in languages equal to half her Smarts die.

edges.name: Luck
edges.description: +1 Benny at the start of each session.

edges.name: Great Luck
edges.description: +2 Bennies at the start of each session.

edges.name: Quick
edges.description: The hero may discard and redraw Action Cards of 5 or lower.

edges.name: Rich
edges.description: Character starts with three times the starting funds and a $150K annual salary.

edges.name: Filthy Rich
edges.description: Five times starting funds and $500K average salary.

edges.name: Block
edges.description: +1 Parry, ignore 1 point of Gang Up bonus.

edges.name: Improved Block
edges.description: +2 Parry, ignore 2 points of Gang Up bonus.

edges.name: Brawler
edges.description: Toughness +1, add d4 to damage from fists; or increase it a die type if combined with Martial Artist, Claws, or similar abilities.

edges.name: Bruiser
edges.description: Increase unarmed Strength damage a die type and Toughness another +1.

edges.name: Calculating
edges.description: Ignore up to 2 points of penalties on one action with an Action Card of Five or less.

edges.name: Combat Reflexes
edges.description: +2 Spirit to recover from being Shaken or Stunned.

edges.name: Counterattack
edges.description: Free attack against one foe per turn who failed a Fighting roll.

edges.name: Improved Counterattack
edges.description: As Counterattack, but against three failed attacks per turn.

edges.name: Dead Shot
edges.description: On first successful Athletics (throwing) or Shooting roll, double damage when dealt a Joker.

edges.name: Dodge
edges.description: -2 to be hit by ranged attacks.

edges.name: Improved Dodge
edges.description: +2 to Evasion totals.

edges.name: Double Tap
edges.description: +1 to hit and damage when firing no more than RoF 1 per action.

edges.name: Extraction
edges.description: One adjacent foe doesn't get a free attack when you withdraw from close combat.

edges.name: Improved Extraction
edges.description: Three adjacent foes don't get free attacks when you withdraw from combat.

edges.name: Feint
edges.description: You may choose to make foe resist with Smarts instead of Agility during a Fighting Test.

edges.name: First Strike
edges.description: Free Fighting attack once per round when foe moves within Reach.

edges.name: Improved First Strike
edges.description: Free Fighting attack against up to three foes when they move within Reach.

edges.name: Free Runner
edges.description: Ignore Difficult Ground and add +2 to Athletics in foot chases and Athletics (climbing).

edges.name: Frenzy
edges.description: Roll a second Fighting die in one melee attack. Limited action.

edges.name: Improved Frenzy
edges.description: Roll a third Fighting die in one melee attack. Limited action.

edges.name: Giant Killer
edges.description: +1d6 damage vs. creatures three Sizes larger or more.

edges.name: Hard to Kill
edges.description: Ignore Wound penalties when making Vigor rolls to avoid Bleeding Out.

edges.name: Harder to Kill
edges.description: Roll a die if the character perishes. On an even roll he's Incapacitated but survives somehow.

edges.name: Improvisational Fighter
edges.description: Ignore -2 penalty when attacking with improvised weapons.

edges.name: Iron Jaw
edges.description: +2 to Soak and Vigor rolls to avoid Knockout Blows.

edges.name: Killer Instinct
edges.description: The hero gets a free reroll in any opposed Test he initiates.

edges.name: Level Headed
edges.description: Draw an additional Action Card each round in combat and choose which one to use.

edges.name: Improved Level Headed
edges.description: Draw two additional Action Cards each round in combat and choose which one to use.

edges.name: Marksman
edges.description: Ignore up to 2 points of penalties from Range, Cover, Called Shot, Scale, or Speed; or add +1 to first Athletics (throwing) or Shooting roll. Character may not move or fire greater than RoF 1.

edges.name: Martial Artist
edges.description: Unarmed Fighting +1, fists and feet count as Natural Weapons, add d4 damage die to unarmed Fighting attacks (or increase die a step if you already have it).

edges.name: Martial Warrior
edges.description: Unarmed Fighting +2, increase damage die type a step.

edges.name: Mighty Blow
edges.description: On first successful Fighting roll, double damage when dealt a Joker.

edges.name: Nerves of Steel
edges.description: Ignore one level of Wound penalties.

edges.name: Improved Nerves of Steel
edges.description: Ignore up to two levels of Wound penalties.

edges.name: No Mercy
edges.description: +2 damage when spending a Benny to reroll damage.

edges.name: Rapid Fire
edges.description: Increase RoF by 1 for one Shooting attack per turn.

edges.name: Improved Rapid Fire
edges.description: Increase RoF by 1 for up to two Shooting attacks per turn.

edges.name: Rock and Roll!
edges.description: Ignore the Recoil penalty when firing weapons with a RoF of 2 or more. Character may not move.

edges.name: Steady Hands
edges.description: Ignore Unstable Platform penalty; reduce running penalty to -1.

edges.name: Sweep
edges.description: Fighting roll with two-handed weapon (-2 without) to hit all targets in weapon's Reach. Limited action.

edges.name: Improved Sweep
edges.description: As above, but attack can avoid allies. Limited action.

edges.name: Trademark Weapon
edges.description: +1 to Athletics (throwing), Fighting, or Shooting total with a specific weapon; +1 Parry while weapon is readied. (You will have to create a custom weapon)

edges.name: Improved Trademark Weapon
edges.description: The attack and Parry bonus increases to +2.(You will have to create a custom weapon)

edges.name: Two-Fisted
edges.description: Make one extra Fighting roll with a second melee weapon in the off-hand at no Multi-Action penalty.

edges.name: Two-Gun Kid
edges.description: Make one extra Shooting (or Athletics (throwing)) roll with a second ranged weapon in the off-hand at no Multi-Action penalty.

edges.name: Artificer
edges.description: Allows user to create Arcane Devices.

edges.name: Channeling
edges.description: Reduce Power Point cost by 1 with a raise on the activation roll.

edges.name: Concentration
edges.description: Double Duration of non-Instant powers.

edges.name: Extra Effort
edges.description: Increase Focus by +1 for 1 Power Point or +2 for 3 Power Points.

edges.name: Gadgeteer
edges.description: Spend 3 Power Points to create a device that replicates another power.

edges.name: Holy/Unholy Warrior
edges.description: Add +1 to +4 to Soak rolls for each Power Point spent.

edges.name: Mentalist
edges.description: +2 to opposed Psionics rolls.

edges.name: New Powers
edges.description: Your character knows two new powers.

edges.name: Power Points
edges.description: Gain 5 additional Power Points, no more than once per Rank.

edges.name: Power Surge
edges.description: Recover 10 Power Points when dealt a Joker in combat.

edges.name: Rapid Recharge
edges.description: Recover 10 Power Points per hour.

edges.name: Improved Rapid Recharge
edges.description: Recover 20 Power Points per hour.

edges.name: Soul Drain
edges.description: Recover 5 Power Points for a level of Fatigue.

edges.name: Wizard
edges.description: Spend 1 extra Power Point to change a spell's Trapping.

edges.name: Ace
edges.description: Character may spend Bennies to Soak damage for his vehicle and ignores up to 2 points of penalties.

edges.name: Acrobat
edges.description: Free reroll on acrobatic Athletics attempts.

edges.name: Combat Acrobat
edges.description: -1 to hit with ranged and melee attacks.

edges.name: Assassin
edges.description: +2 to damage foes when Vulnerable or assassin has The Drop.

edges.name: Investigator
edges.description: +2 to Research and certain types of Notice rolls.

edges.name: Jack-of-all-Trades
edges.description: Gain d4 in a skill (or d6 with a raise) until replaced.

edges.name: McGyver
edges.description: Quickly create improvised devices from scraps.

edges.name: Mr. Fix It
edges.description: +2 to Repair rolls, half the time required with a raise.

edges.name: Scholar
edges.description: +2 to any one "knowledge" skill.

edges.name: Soldier
edges.description: Strength is one die type higher for Encumbrance and Min Str. Reroll Vigor rolls when resisting environmental Hazards.

edges.name: Thief
edges.description: +1 to Thievery, Athletics rolls made to climb, and Stealth in urban environments.

edges.name: Woodsman
edges.description: +2 to Survival and Stealth in the wilds.

edges.name: Bolster
edges.description: May remove Distracted or Vulnerable state after a Test.

edges.name: Common Bond
edges.description: The hero may freely give her Bennies to others.

edges.name: Connections
edges.description: Contacts provide aid or other favors once per session.

edges.name: Humiliate
edges.description: Free reroll when making Taunt rolls.

edges.name: Menacing
edges.description: +2 to Intimidation.

edges.name: Provoke
edges.description: May "provoke" foes with a raise on a Taunt roll. See text.

edges.name: Rabble-Rouser
edges.description: Affect all foes in a Medium Blast Template with an Intimidation or Taunt Test. Limited action.

edges.name: Reliable
edges.description: Free reroll when making Support rolls.

edges.name: Retort
edges.description: A raise when resisting a Taunt or Intimidation attack makes the foe Distracted.

edges.name: Streetwise
edges.description: +2 to Common Knowledge and criminal networking.

edges.name: Strong Willed
edges.description: +2 to resist Smarts or Spirit-based Tests.

edges.name: Iron Will
edges.description: The bonus now applies to resisting and recovery from powers.

edges.name: Work the Room
edges.description: Roll a second die when Supporting via Performance or Persuasion and apply result to additional ally. Limited action.

edges.name: Work the Crowd
edges.description: As above, but roll a third die. Limited action.

edges.name: Beast Bond
edges.description: The hero may spend Bennies for animals under her control.

edges.name: Beast Master
edges.description: Animals like your hero and he has a pet of some sort. See text.

edges.name: Champion
edges.description: +2 damage vs. supernaturally evil creatures.

edges.name: Chi
edges.description: Once per combat, reroll failed attack, make enemy reroll successful attack, or add +d6 to unarmed Fighting attack.

edges.name: Danger Sense
edges.description: Notice roll at +2 to sense ambushes or similar events.

edges.name: Healer
edges.description: +2 to Healing rolls, magical or otherwise.

edges.name: Liquid Courage
edges.description: Alcohol increases Vigor a die type and ignores one level of Wound penalty; -1 to Agility, Smarts, and related skills.

edges.name: Scavenger
edges.description: May find a needed item once per encounter.

edges.name: Followers
edges.description: The hero has five followers.

edges.name: Professional (Attribute)
edges.description: The character's Trait and its limit increases one step.

edges.name: Professional (Skill)
edges.description: The character's Trait and its limit increases one step.

edges.name: Expert (Attribute)
edges.description: The character's Trait and its limit increases one step.

edges.name: Expert (Skill)
edges.description: The character's Trait and its limit increases one step.

edges.name: Master
edges.description: The character's Wild Die is a d10 with a chosen Trait.

edges.name: Sidekick
edges.description: The character gains a Wild Card sidekick.

edges.name: Tough as Nails
edges.description: The hero can take four Wounds before being Incapacitated.

edges.name: Tougher than Nails
edges.description: The hero can take five Wounds before being Incapacitated.

edges.name: Weapon Master
edges.description: Parry increases by +1 and Fighting bonus damage die is d8.

edges.name: Master of Arms
edges.description: Parry increases another +1 and Fighting bonus damage die is d10.
